abstract: South Korea confirms seven cases of Middle East Respiratory Syndrome, or MERS.
lead_paragraph: The number of people confirmed to have contracted Middle East Respiratory Syndrome, or MERS, increased to seven on Thursday.

headline.main: South Korea: Health Officials Confirm Two More Cases of MERS Virus
headline.print_headline: Asia; South Korea: Health Officials Confirm Two More Cases of MERS Virus
